News.Title: WU - Communication
News.Text: Please click on the 'Place an Order' tab at the top of this page to order Stationery and Marketing materials. Should you require further assistance a detailed user guide is available to view on Agent Portal.

News.Title: WU - Communication
News.Text: At Western Union we are committed to bringing about change that benefits YOU our customer. As such, exciting new changes are being made to this site to help improve the look & feel as well as introduce enhanced functionality. This will allow for a quicker and easier way to process your orders. So look out for the new changes and promotions.
